item.title: A pothole in road problem, 21st November
item.description:
Customer reporting a football depth pothole in the road in the tyre line. No damage done but keeps being repaired and woudl be an issue for cyclists.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Notes and plastic ties all over pavement, 21st November
item.description:
Delivery notes and plastic ties on pavement again after they have been picked up, more have appeared. Please can this be cleared up as as soon as possible as it is a huge trip hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnett Way, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Traffic lights sequencing has changed causing queues, 21st November
item.description:
The traffic lights have fallen out of sync with each other when travelling threw on Tewksbury road, it used to be the lights would go green in a time that meant you never needed to stop once you entered the round about when going straight across in either direction, now you are forced to stop for a few seconds while on the roundabout, at busy times this blocks multiple exits on the round about
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Dangerous junction, 21st November
item.description:
I use this road daily and you have to edge out of the road to see if any traffic is coming, because otherwise you cannot see the traffic coming from the left if you are turning right or going straight over the junction. I have had abuse twice for edging out to see what was coming and today I almost got hit by a speeding large van. Its very scary and makes the junction very dangerous. Please could you put a mirror or something so you can see what is coming left
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
